item.description:
COMMUNITY MIXER

Wednesday, February 20, 2008 6:00 ? 8:30pm

Bell in Hand Tavern - 45 Union Street, Boston (Haymarket/Faneuil Hall)

Join us for our popular Community Mixer and network with your colleagues. Enjoy free appetizers, and a cash bar.

This is a fun, social, networking event organized by
BAYREP, Bay Area Real Estate Professionals

cohosted by
BSA Young Professional Network (YPNet)
Boston Architecture Meetup Group
NAIOP Developing Leaders
ULI Young Leaders
REFA Emerging Leaders
SDA Boston
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a nametag.
item.name: Building Industry Community Mixer
